description:
Both Kazuma and Kawachi have made it past the preliminaries and now the Rookie Competition has officially begun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lever de rideaux !! Le concours des nouveaux !
Sorezore no Kaimaku!! Pantasia Shinjinsen Kaishi!
Their Respective Beginnings!! Pantasia`s Rookie Competition Opens!
เปิดตัวต่างๆกัน! ศึกหน้าใหม่ปังตาเซียเริ่มขึ้นแล้ว!
それぞれの開幕!! パンタジア新人戦開始!
